topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55729430636872598cb41b00#post_55729430636872598cb41b00

"Ideologically" (note the quotations), profit companies and associations are meant to be Politically neutral, that being, zero biased agenda towards a certain political group. This in order to "avoid" unofficial funding that could get  them an unfair advantage during electoral periods and have a candidate of their choosing win as much as say, in games there's "Pay to Win" players.

Now the reality is obviously different, the term you used specially allows them to get away with this since by not being directly involved with one single side openly, they can support one side at a time, then completely support another.
